title: Procure Radiation-Hardened Electronics
description: A procurement manager needs to buy radiation-hardened microprocessors for a satellite's flight computer.

tasks.description: Identify the specific part number and radiation tolerance requirements (e.g., 100 krad) from the bill of materials.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the required component specifications.

tasks.description: Find a supplier that specializes in space-grade, radiation-hardened electronics.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a qualified supplier from the approved vendor list.

tasks.description: Place a purchase order for the components and ensure it includes requirements for full traceability and certification.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a purchase order with all necessary flow-down requirements.
